content.body: If it's limited to scoped `using` and not general mutability, I think you can polyfill on top of `AsyncContext` and only instrument `await` and `yield` statements.
content.formatted_body: If it's limited to scoped using and not general mutability, I think you can polyfill on top of AsyncContext and only instrument await and yield statements.

content.body: I know we talked about this before and I said otherwise, but I can't remember why I said it wasn't possible before.
